column1: Mobile automation - API  / UI automation- Professional
column2: API Automation: Definition: API (Application Programming Interface) automation involves testing the backend services and functionality of a mobile application programmatically. Purpose: API automation verifies that the backend services are functioning correctly, handling requests, and returning the expected responses. Tools: Common tools for API automation include Postman, REST Assured (for Java), Axios (for JavaScript), and Retrofit (for Android). Test Cases: API automation test cases validate endpoints, request parameters, response codes, response payloads, error handling, and authentication mechanisms. Frameworks: API automation can be performed using various testing frameworks such as TestNG, JUnit, Mocha, or Jest. UI Automation: Definition: UI (User Interface) automation involves testing the user interface and interactions of a mobile application programmatically. Purpose: UI automation verifies that the user interface elements are displayed correctly, respond to user interactions, and navigate the application as expected. Tools: Common tools for UI automation include Appium, Espresso (for Android), XCUITest (for iOS), and Detox. Test Cases: UI automation test cases validate UI elements, navigation flows, user inputs, gestures, and screen transitions. Frameworks: UI automation can be performed using various testing frameworks such as Selenium, WebDriverIO, XCTest, or XCTestUI. Integration of API and UI Automation: Combining Both: In many cases, mobile automation involves integrating both API and UI automation to achieve comprehensive test coverage. End-to-End Testing: End-to-end testing scenarios can be automated to simulate real user interactions, starting from API requests and responses to UI interactions and validations. Data Flow Testing: Data flow between the backend API and frontend UI can be verified through automated test scenarios, ensuring data consistency and integrity. Challenges and Considerations: Platform Specifics: Different mobile platforms (Android and iOS) may require platform-specific tools and frameworks for automation. Device Fragmentation: Testing across various devices, screen sizes, and OS versions can be challenging and may require device farms or cloud-based testing services. Test Environment Setup: Setting up test environments with mock servers, test data, and device emulators/simulators can be time-consuming but is crucial for reliable automation. Maintenance: Regular maintenance of automation scripts is necessary to keep up with changes in the application codebase, UI designs, and API endpoints.
column11: Mobile automation, UI automation, Java, REST Assured, JavaScript, API, API Automation, Postman

Strong communication and collaboration skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

column1: Mobile automation - API  / UI automation- Professional
column2: API Automation: Definition: API (Application Programming Interface) automation involves testing the backend services and functionality of a mobile application programmatically. Purpose: API automation verifies that the backend services are functioning correctly, handling requests, and returning the expected responses. Tools: Common tools for API automation include Postman, REST Assured (for Java), Axios (for JavaScript), and Retrofit (for Android). Test Cases: API automation test cases validate endpoints, request parameters, response codes, response payloads, error handling, and authentication mechanisms. Frameworks: API automation can be performed using various testing frameworks such as TestNG, JUnit, Mocha, or Jest. UI Automation: Definition: UI (User Interface) automation involves testing the user interface and interactions of a mobile application programmatically. Purpose: UI automation verifies that the user interface elements are displayed correctly, respond to user interactions, and navigate the application as expected. Tools: Common tools for UI automation include Appium, Espresso (for Android), XCUITest (for iOS), and Detox. Test Cases: UI automation test cases validate UI elements, navigation flows, user inputs, gestures, and screen transitions. Frameworks: UI automation can be performed using various testing frameworks such as Selenium, WebDriverIO, XCTest, or XCTestUI. Integration of API and UI Automation: Combining Both: In many cases, mobile automation involves integrating both API and UI automation to achieve comprehensive test coverage. End-to-End Testing: End-to-end testing scenarios can be automated to simulate real user interactions, starting from API requests and responses to UI interactions and validations. Data Flow Testing: Data flow between the backend API and frontend UI can be verified through automated test scenarios, ensuring data consistency and integrity. Challenges and Considerations: Platform Specifics: Different mobile platforms (Android and iOS) may require platform-specific tools and frameworks for automation. Device Fragmentation: Testing across various devices, screen sizes, and OS versions can be challenging and may require device farms or cloud-based testing services. Test Environment Setup: Setting up test environments with mock servers, test data, and device emulators/simulators can be time-consuming but is crucial for reliable automation. Maintenance: Regular maintenance of automation scripts is necessary to keep up with changes in the application codebase, UI designs, and API endpoints.
column11: Mobile automation, UI automation, Java, REST Assured, JavaScript, API, API Automation, Postman

column2: As a leading technology innovator, Qualcomm pushes the boundaries of whats possible to enable next-generation experiences and drives digital transformation to help create a smarter, connected future for all.          As a Qualcomm Software Engineer, you will design, develop, create, modify, and validate embedded and cloud edge software, applications, and/or specialized utility programs that launch cutting-edge, world class products that meet and exceed customer needs. Qualcomm Software Engineers collaborate with systems, hardware, architecture, test engineers, and other teams to design system-level software solutions and obtain information on performance requirements and interfaces.                      Minimum Qualifications:        Bachelors degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 6+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.    OR    Masters degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 5+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.    OR    PhD in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field and 4+ years of Software Engineering or related work experience.      3+ years of work experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.                    Job Description                          Create software/firmware test plans, addressing requirements traceability matrix and test coverage, with respect to feature      requirements                      Design, develop,      execute      and      maintain      automated software/firmware test suites for the purpose of verifying quality and compliance of Qualcomm products at      functional, integration and      system      level      s                      Manually test, where      appropriate      , the      customer      experience of installation and deployment of Qualcomm hardware and software in a mobile,      compute      and automotive environment.                      Assist      in the creation of a Quality Engineering/Release engineering process with emphasis on continuous integration and continuous      development                      Assist      in      achieving      production      -level      software readiness,      implement      customer use-cases, workload analysis      models      , workload creation, and collaborating with other teams on bring-up/debug/      diags                      Focus on ensuring that existing Operating Systems and customer usage environments run well, while      identifying      strong      opportunity      for enhancements      , from a power and performance perspective.                                              Preferred Qualifications                          12 years+ of      demonstrated      software test engineering      experience                              Strong understanding and experience in software/firmware test automation techniques                              Strong programming skills with experience in C and/or Python programming languages                              Extensive e      xperience working with      operating systems like Windows,      Linux      and Android                              Experience developing automated software/firmware test cases for mobile, compute and/or automotive platforms, supporting bring-up and production SW      releases                              Experience testing for production quality software, on schedule, particularly in an organization that delivers software to enable      SOC (System-On-Chip)      solutions                              Additional Asset qualification: Experience in release engineering, continuous      integration      and continuous development environments

column2: Location: Mumbai / Hyderabad / Remote India Job Summary: As the Senior Automation Engineer, you will be instrumental in automating and enhancing various healthcare processes. Your role will encompass modeling, developing, and supporting Process Automation (RPA) projects while acting as a consultant to drive process re-engineering and solution design. You will manage projects, stakeholders, and contribute to identifying opportunities for process improvement. Key Responsibilities: Lead the modeling, development, and support of Process Automation projects. Act as an RPA consultant, providing expertise in process re-engineering, solution design, and project management. Identify opportunities for process improvement and automate using RPA software/tools. Ensure projects are completed on time and within budget, applying effective project management skills. Develop automation scripts in the RPA tool, considering process descriptions and feasibility. Maintain and update Developer Standards based on RPA best practices. Design, develop, test, and support automation solutions using RPA tools. Provide ongoing operational support, including upgrades, defect fixes, and process change activities. Fine-tune performance and address operational issues, including those related to RPA Bots. Support end-to-end implementation, covering design, implementation, testing, and deployment. Investigate and document best practices and alternative solutions for future development. Drive and support incident and change management. Serve as the single point of contact for technical support and guidance. Be flexible and adaptable to work with various automation tools as needed. Efficiently design and build instructions to automate assigned business workflows. Adhere to procedures, policies, and documentation requirements throughout project phases. Mentor and guide other Automation Engineers through code reviews, development sessions, and pair-programming. Troubleshoot issues during software development processes. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Minimum of 5+ years of experience in a software development role. Experience with web development technologies, with a preference for JavaScript and C#. Experience with RPA Software (e.g., Automation Anywhere - Preferred, BluePrism, UI Path, WorkFusion) is advantageous. Proven experience in assessing automation opportunities from a technical perspective and performing due diligence to arrive at optimal solutions. Ability to define the technical framework considering access methods, user authentication, IT security, application landscape, and hosting environments. Strong analytical skills with the ability to understand existing systems and propose solutions accordingly. Excellent written skills with the ability to clearly document and explain business processes and automated solution designs. Ability to discuss and drive solutions across cross-functional groups. Effective communication and interaction with diverse groups, including executives, managers, and subject matter experts. Proficiency in explaining and demonstrating ideas to a large audience with excellent presentation skills. Effective stakeholder management across multiple verticals and sharing timely updates with senior management. Experience and understanding in documenting business processes using UML or BPMN notation. Experience working with a pharmaceutical/healthcare company or a client on the IT side is a plus

column2: We are seeking a Senior Automation Engineer with 6-7 years of experience in Selenium and Python to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding and hands-on experience in quality assurance, software validation, and automation practices. Additionally, expertise in networking fundamentals and protocols, along with API and web UI testing automation, is crucial for success in this role. Key Responsibilities :  - Develop and maintain automated test scripts using Selenium and Python for web UI testing. - Design and execute API testing and automation using Python, with a focus on REST APIs. - Utilize networking knowledge to validate software functionality, including L2/L3 protocols (OSPF, ISIS, BGP, MPLS, Segment Routing), MPLS TE, and L2VPN. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the quality and reliability of software products. - Implement and maintain test automation frameworks to improve efficiency and scalability. - Contribute to the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline using tools such as Git and Jenkins. - Analyze requirements and develop test plans to ensure comprehensive test coverage. - Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging technologies in automation and quality assurance. Requirements :  - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. - 6-7 years of experience in software quality assurance and automation. - Proficiency in Selenium WebDriver and Python for web UI testing automation. - Strong understanding of networking basics and L2/L3 protocols. - Hands-on experience with API testing and automation using Python. - In-depth knowledge of Python programming concepts such as functions, classes, and decorators. - Familiarity with version control systems (e.g. Git), CI/CD pipelines, and performance testing tools (e.g. JMeter) is a plus. - Cisco certifications (CCNA, CCNP) are preferred but not required. - Excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment. Locaion: Delhi NCR,Goa,Others, Bengaluru,Pune,Nagpur,Hyderabad,Jaipur,Ahmedabad
column11: Automation Engineering, Git, CI/CD, software quality assurance, Selenium, CCNA, CCNP, Python, API testing

column2: S&T Org, Digital Products and Services (DPS Team) at PepsiCo  The Digital Evolution is critical to driving PepsiCos ambitions around being FASTER, STRONGER, and BETTER. Under the Strategy & Transformation (S&T) organization, the Digital Products & Services team designs, builds, and stands up digital solutions across the value chain, that are embedded into business processes to optimize efficiency, reduce costs, and maintain high ROI. Guided by PEPSICOs global priorities, the Digital Products & Services team create user-centric digital products that can be scaled globally by leveraging the leading technologies, advanced analytics algorithms and latest user research. For more information on the PepsiCo Digital Hub, refer to the link: https://www.pepsicojobs.com/strategy-and-transformation Software QA Senior Analyst  We are seeking an experienced and dedicated Mobile QA Senior Analyst to join our dynamic team. As a Mobile QA Senior Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the quality, reliability, and performance of our mobile applications. Your expertise will contribute to the seamless user experience and the overall success of our products in collaboration across the Strategy & Transformation (S&T) organization. Software Engineering is the corner stone of scalable digital transformation across PepsiCos value chain.  You will work closely with the user experience, product, IT, and process engineering teams to develop new products and prioritize deliver solutions across S&T core priorities. Your Impact : Quality Assurance Testing:  Conduct comprehensive testing of mobile applications across various platforms (iOS and Android) to identify defects, inconsistencies, and performance issues. Test Planning and Strategy:  Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop test plans, test cases, and test strategies that align with project requirements and goals. Test Execution:  Perform manual and automated testing of mobile applications to validate functionality, usability, compatibility, and performance. Defect Management:  Document and track defects, perform root cause analysis, and work closely with developers to ensure timely resolution. Regression Testing:  Execute regression testing to verify bug fixes and enhancements, ensuring the overall stability of the application. Usability and User Experience Testing:  Evaluate the user interface, navigation, and overall user experience of mobile applications, providing insights for improvement. Performance Testing:  Conduct load, stress, and performance testing to identify potential bottlenecks and ensure optimal application performance. Test Automation:  Develop and maintain automated test scripts and frameworks using industry-standard tools to enhance testing efficiency and coverage. Collaboration:  Work closely with developers, designers, and product managers to understand application functionality and user requirements. Participate in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and review meetings to provide testing insights. Continuous Improvement:  Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in mobile QA. Proactively suggest process improvements to enhance QA methodologies and practices. Mentorship and Training:  Provide guidance and mentorship to junior QA team members, sharing your knowledge and expertise to foster a culture of continuous learning Minimum Qualifications: A Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field  Minimum 9+ years of experience in mobile QA testing, with a focus on iOS and Android platforms. Expertise / Programming experience in at least in one Code language (Java, Python, JS/Typescript) Should have 6+ years test case automation experience using Selenium, Cucumber, Appium and 3+ years experience in API (Functional testing and Automation), Programming Language Java,  Must have 3+ years experience in CI/CD concepts, setup and productive usage,  Experience with testing and project management tools for reporting test results and milestones,  Knowledge of Database preferably SQL.  Knowledge of Public Clouds (AWS/Azure).  Should be willing to work both in functional and automation testing. Proficiency in functional testing, test case creation, and defect tracking. Strong understanding of mobile testing methodologies, tools, and best practices. Expertise in practical knowledge of debugging tools on web and mobile platforms Expert in API Automation testing and exposure to REST API framework , Automation experience using any of the tools ??Postman, Rest assured will be effective for the role. Strong Experience in Integration testing (SIT) and ability to understand the system/Data Flow architecture and guide the team to build effective test scenarios. Good Experience working with SQL and large volumes of data.  Experience with Continuous Integration (preferably - Azure) Thorough understanding of the role and the place of QA in SDLC, testing processes and methodologies Knowledge of Espresso & XCUITest (nice to have) Knowledge of white box testing (nice to have) Exposure about Device Farms like BrowserStack and SauceLabs Experience working in distributed team (nice to have) Experience in Android platform is a plus Good understanding on SOLID design Principles and Performance testing principles, Jmeter  Working knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented design  Expert in implementing and optimizing agile development and continuous integration / continuous delivery methodologies Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple priorities. Ability to work collaboratively with regional and global partners in other functional units Any relevant certifications would be a plus, e.g., ISTQB Mobile Application Testing Certification.

column2: Job Title: Sr Software Tester(JAVA OR Python) Location: Noida Sec 58 Work From Office Only Position Type: Full-time Experience: 7-10 years   Role & responsibilities   Overview:  We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Software Testing Engineer with extensive experience in both manual and automation testing.  The ideal candidate will have a strong background in utilizing testing tools such as Selenium and Katalon, along with proficiency in Java and Python programming languages.  In addition to automation expertise, the candidate should possess comprehensive knowledge of database testing and mobile testing methodologies.   Responsibilities:   Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts for both manual and automated testing processes. Design, implement, and maintain automation frameworks using Selenium, Katalon, Java, and Python to ensure efficient and effective test automation. Collaborate with cross-functional teams including developers, product managers, and quality assurance engineers to identify testing requirements and ensure adequate test coverage. Perform thorough regression testing to validate software functionality and identify potential defects. Conduct performance testing, load testing, and stress testing as necessary to assess system reliability and scalability. Utilize database querying techniques to validate data integrity and ensure accurate information retrieval. Conduct mobile testing across various platforms and devices to ensure optimal performance and user experience. Document and report defects, track their resolution, and verify fixes promptly. Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in software testing to continuously improve testing processes and methodologies. Requirements:   Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 7-10 years of experience in software testing roles, with a focus on both manual and automation testing.  Proficiency in automation testing tools such as Selenium and Katalon. Strong programming skills in Java and Python. Experience in database testing techniques and SQL querying. Familiarity with mobile testing methodologies and tools. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with meticulous attention to detail. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Proven track record of delivering high-quality software products within established timelines. column2: Position Overview: We are seeking a skilled Quality Assurance Engineer with expertise in industrial automation to join our dynamic team.  The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our automation systems through meticulous testing and validation processes.  This role requires a strong understanding of automation frameworks and tools, with proficiency in both manual and automated testing methodologies. Key Responsibilities: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts to validate the functionality and performance of our automation systems. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including software developers, engineers, and project managers to identify quality requirements and ensure alignment with project objectives. Utilize industry-standard tools such as TestCafe and other automation frameworks to automate test cases and streamline the testing process. Conduct regression testing, load testing, and stress testing to assess system stability and performance under various conditions. Analyze test results, identify defects, and work collaboratively with development teams to resolve issues in a timely manner. Design and maintain test data sets and test environments to support ongoing testing activities. Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and best practices in quality assurance and industrial automation technologies. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience in quality assurance/testing roles, with a focus on industrial automation systems. Strong proficiency in automation testing tools such as TestCafe, Selenium, or similar frameworks. Experience with scripting languages such as Python, for test automation. Knowledge of industrial automation protocols and standards (e.g., OPC UA, Modbus, Profibus) is highly desirable. Effective communication skills and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams. Proactive mindset with a commitment to continuous learning and professional development. column2: We are looking for a skilled Selenium Tester with expertise in SQL, Python, PySpark, Hive, and Snowflake to join our quality assurance team. As a Selenium Tester, you will be responsible for designing and executing automated test scripts using Selenium WebDriver to ensure the quality and reliability of our software applications. Additionally, you will leverage your knowledge of SQL, Python, PySpark, Hive, and Snowflake to develop comprehensive test scenarios and perform data validation to ensure the accuracy and integrity of our data-driven applications. Key Responsibilities : Develop and maintain automated test scripts using Selenium WebDriver to validate the functionality of web-based applications. Design, implement, and execute test cases and test scenarios based on functional and non-functional requirements. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and identify test scenarios for automation. Perform data validation and verification using SQL queries to ensure the accuracy and integrity of data stored in relational databases. Utilize Python scripting for test automation, data manipulation, and test data generation. Work with Big Data technologies such as PySpark, Hive, and Snowflake to validate data processing and analytics pipelines. Execute regression tests, smoke tests, and integration tests to validate software releases and deployments. Analyze test results, identify defects, and collaborate with developers to resolve issues in a timely manner. Document test cases, test results, and defects to facilitate communication and knowledge sharing within the team. Stay updated with emerging trends and best practices in software testing, test automation, and Big Data technologies. Requirements : Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. Proven experience as a Software Tester or Quality Assurance Engineer, with experience in automated testing using Selenium WebDriver. Strong proficiency in SQL for data validation and manipulation, with experience working with relational databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or Oracle. Proficiency in Python programming language for test automation and scripting. Experience with Big Data technologies such as PySpark, Hive, and Snowflake for data validation and analytics. Solid understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and best practices. Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Relevant certifications in software testing, Selenium WebDriver, or Big Data technologies are a plus.

column2: Role & responsibilities     Review functional and design specifications to ensure full understanding of individual deliverables. Ensure that validated deliverables meet functional and design specifications and requirements. Identify and write test scenarios and test cases from user stories and acceptance criteria. Isolate, replicate, and document/report defects and verify defect fixes. Execute and evaluate manual or automated test cases and report test results. Participate in test plan/case reviews with cross-functional team members. Clearly understand the difference between missed requirements, development bugs, production defects, and backlog items.? Develop, document, and maintain functional test cases and other test artifacts such as test data, data validation, scripts, and more. Identify any potential quality issues per defined process and escalate potential quality issues immediately to management. Participate in the improvement of the quality assurance process, deliverables, and methodologies. QA Automation Candidate with experience in Selenium (using Java) framework. Testing, Maven, Data-driven Framework knowledge is required. Proficient in different types of Testing like Integration, Regression, Smoke Sanity, User Acceptance testing etc.Proficient in different types of Testing like Integration, Regression, Smoke Sanity, User Acceptance testing etc. Should have knowledge of Defect Management, Bug life cycle, Performance management using ALM tool. Good Understanding of Soap & rest tool. Exposure with working in Agile/Scrum environment. Understanding of QA metrics and reporting. Should have excellent written and verbal Communication Skills & work independently & in a team with a high level of quality. Creation and execution of test cases, test scenarios, test plan, test scripts for manual & automated testing. Bachelors in computer science or similar relevant field.Ability to work in a highly dynamic and fast-paced environments.Ability to focus on deadlines and deliverables. Perks and benefits     Paid medical insurance with COVID-19 coverage right from the first day! Get up to 32 days of paid time off, monthly short leaves, marriage leaves, and?additional unpaid vacation leaves. Annual salary increases with a predictable percentage increase based on performance review. Annual year-end bonus and monthly bonuses based on performance. Able to work from home 1 day per week, every week. Earn as much as INR 20,000? from the employee referral program. Happy Hour every Friday  Free meal every Friday with an extra hour of break time to bond with the team and participate in games and activities. Perform   thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved. Develop   and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client   needs. Investigate   the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions.    Identify   test requirements from the Specifications. Design   test plans and scenarios covering features under development to determine   product quality or release readiness. Implementing   testing procedures and overseeing the QA process. Execute   manual campaigns and hotfix tests. Document   software defects, monitor the progress in a timely manner, escalate aging and   priority defects. column2: Job Title: Sr. QA Automation Engineer Location: Ahmedabad Experience: 3-5 years Company: JigNect Technologies Pvt. Ltd. About Us: As a leading provider of software quality assurance / testing services, we leverage cuttingedge testing strategies and tools to deliver comprehensive and tailored QA/testing solutions that cater to your unique needs and exceed your expectations. What sets us apart is our diverse set of technical skills and unwavering commitment to quality, as exemplified by our belief that "Quality is not an act, it is a habit. Quality assurance is not a phase, it is a way of life. Job Summary :  As an Automation Software Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and executing automated test scripts to ensure the quality and reliability of software applications. Your role will involve collaborating with the QA team and developers to understand software requirements, designing test cases, and implementing automation frameworks. You will execute tests, analyze test results, and identify software defects. Your contribution will play a vital role in maintaining high-quality standards and ensuring the timely delivery of software products. Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using industry-standard automation tools and frameworks. Collaborate with the QA team and developers to understand software requirements and design comprehensive test cases. Implement and maintain automation frameworks and infrastructure to support test automation efforts. Execute automated test suites and analyse test results to identify software defects, performance issues, and regressions. Document and track software defects, ensuring their resolution through proper defect management practices. Work closely with the development team to reproduce and debug reported issues. Participate in code reviews and provide feedback on testability and quality aspects of the code. Continuously improve the automation test suite, adding new test cases and enhancing existing ones. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure software releases meet quality standards and are delivered on time. Stay updated with emerging technologies, tools, and best practices in automation testing. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Proven work experience as an Automation Software Testing Engineer or similar role. Strong proficiency in programming languages like Java, Python, or C# for developing automation scripts. Experience with automation frameworks such as Selenium, Appium, or Cucumber. Solid understanding of software testing methodologies, tools, and processes. Knowledge of web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and web services (RESTful APIs). Familiarity with version control systems, defect tracking tools, and test management tools. Ability to write SQL queries for database validation and data manipulation. Understanding of Agile development methodologies and experience working in Scrum teams. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with great attention to detail. Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks to meet project deadlines. Experience with continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines is a plus. Familiarity with API testing tools such as Postman, SoapUI, or Rest Assured is a plus. Benefits:  Be A Full-Stack Developer  Health Care Benefits  Flexibility @Work  Fun Loving Culture  Trips, Events & Celebrations  Career Growth

column2: Position Overview:  PodUp is seeking a highly skilled and motivated QA Tester and Automation Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our SaaS platform through rigorous testing methodologies and the development of robust automation frameworks. Key Responsibilities: Quality Assurance Testing: Design and execute comprehensive test plans and test cases to evaluate the functionality, performance, and usability of PodUp's software products. Identify and document software defects, inconsistencies, and areas for improvement, ensuring adherence to quality standards and best practices. Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and designers, to prioritize and address issues effectively. Conduct regression testing to validate software modifications and enhancements while maintaining overall product integrity. Automation Engineering: Develop and implement automated test scripts and frameworks using industry-standard tools and technologies (e.g., Selenium, Appium, JUnit) to streamline testing processes and improve efficiency. Continuously enhance and optimize automation suites to increase test coverage, minimize manual effort, and accelerate release cycles. Integrate automated tests into the CI/CD pipeline to facilitate early detection of defects and ensure seamless deployment of software updates. Stay abreast of emerging trends and advancements in test automation methodologies, recommending and implementing innovative solutions to enhance the QA workflow. Collaboration and Communication: Communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels to convey testing progress, findings, and recommendations in a clear and concise manner. Actively participate in Agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospective meetings, to contribute to the iterative development process and drive continuous improvement. Foster a culture of quality and accountability within the organization by championing QA best practices, knowledge sharing, and collaborative problem-solving. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). Proven experience in software quality assurance testing, preferably in a SaaS environment. Strong proficiency in test automation tools and frameworks, with hands-on expertise in scripting languages such as Python, Java, or JavaScript. Experience with Selenium WebDriver, Appium, or similar automation libraries for web and mobile testing. Solid understanding of Agile methodologies and familiarity with tools like JIRA for issue tracking and project management. Excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and problem-solving abilities. Effective communication skills, with the ability to collaborate cross-functionally and articulate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Self-motivated and proactive approach to learning and professional development. Prior experience in podcasting or media technology is a plus but not required.

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Automation Engineer with expertise in Selenium and Appium to join our team. As an Automation Engineer, you will play a critical role in designing, implementing, and maintaining automated test suites for web and mobile applications. You will collaborate closely with our development, quality assurance, and product teams to ensure the quality, reliability, and scalability of our software products. Responsibilities: -  Develop and maintain automated test scripts and test suites for web applications using Selenium WebDriver. -  Develop and maintain automated test scripts and test suites for mobile applications (iOS and Android) using Appium. -  Design and implement robust and scalable automation frameworks to support automated testing efforts. -  Collaborate with cross - functional teams including developers, quality assurance engineers, and product managers to understand requirements and acceptance criteria. -  Execute automated test suites and analyze test results to identify defects, regressions, and performance issues. -  Troubleshoot and debug issues, identify root causes, and implement effective solutions. -  Integrate automated tests into continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for automated regression testing. -  Maintain and update existing automated test scripts and test suites to accommodate changes in application functionality and requirements. -  Participate in sprint planning, daily stand - ups, and retrospective meetings, providing input on testing efforts, test coverage, and automation strategy. -  Stay up- to- date with the latest automation tools, techniques, and best practices, and actively contribute to knowledge sharing within the team.Requirements: -  Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent work experience. -  Proven experience as an Automation Engineer or Software Engineer in Test, with at least 3 years of experience in automated testing using Selenium and Appium. -  Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript. -  Extensive experience with Selenium WebDriver and Appium for web and mobile automation, including creating and executing test scripts, handling dynamic elements, and managing test environments. -  Solid understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and best practices. -  Experience with test automation frameworks such as TestNG, JUnit, or pytest. -  Experience with version control systems such as Git and code collaboration platforms like GitHub or GitLab. -  Excellent problem- solving and troubleshooting skills, with a strong attention to detail. -  Ability to work effectively in a fast- paced, agile environment and deliver high- quality work under tight deadlines. -  Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a cross- functional team environment.Preferred Qualifications: -  Experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines using tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or CircleCI. -  Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform. -  Knowledge of performance testing tools and techniques. -  Experience with other automation tools and frameworks such as Cypress, TestComplete, or Robot Framework. -  Certifications related to software testing and automation (e.g., ISTQB, Selenium WebDriver certification) are a plus. -  Contributions to open- source projects or active participation in automation communities is a bonus.

column2: Role Description Our Investments - agile teams at Deutsche Bank - Private Bank (TDI) develop and maintain applications for securities business of Private Customers. By working in an Agile DevOps model, acting a pilot for Investments and actively improving the model, we achieve very high quality while continuously delivering value to our clients. Located in Germany and India, we work closely together using agile and virtual collaboration techniques and our team's diversity to reach our goals of continuous deployment, process improvement and internalizing engineering know how. As a Quality and Testing Engineer you will closely work together with business and operation units and bring functional testing, test management and test automation skills to enforce the development team within a Squad. You will extensively make use and apply test automation concepts and practices in the context of Deutsche Bank's digitalization journey. Key Roles & Responsibilities You are involved in the Software Development Lifecycle starting from analyzing requirements, maintaining test cases, developing test automation features and testing software - continuously improving these topics. column2: Automation QA Engineer Are you passionate about ensuring the quality and reliability of SaaS products, Web or Mobile Application? Do you have a keen eye for detail and a knack for finding and fixing bugs? Do you love to automate systems for repeat work and improve efficiency? If so, we are looking for a dedicated Sr Quality Assurance Engineer to join our team. As a Sr QA Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing a team and ensuring that our software applications meet the highest standards of quality and usability. Key Responsibilities: Ability to adopt new technology and skills. Test Execution: Perform functional, regression, and performance testing to identify defects and verify software functionality. Execute test cases and report issues using a bug-tracking system. Documentation: Create and maintain detailed test documentation, including test cases, test data, and test reports. Ensure that all testing activities are well-documented for future reference. Continuous Improvement: Actively participate in process improvement initiatives to enhance testing methodologies and techniques. Identify areas for optimization in the software development lifecycle. Bug Triage: Collaborate with developers and product managers to prioritize and triage reported issues. Verify fixes and ensure they meet quality standards. Compatibility Testing: Validate software compatibility across different platforms, browsers, and devices. Feedback: Provide feedback and suggestions for improving the user experience and software quality. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). Proven experience as a Quality Assurance Engineer or a similar role. Strong understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and best practices. Proficiency in test management and bug-tracking tools. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team. Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality software. Preferred Qualifications: ISTQB or other relevant certifications. Familiarity with agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban). Technical Skills Computer proficiency, Bug Tracking tools, PMS (Jira/Asana/Trello),  performance testing tools (Jmeter, LoadRunner), API Testing(Manual+Automation) Soft Skill Understanding of English, Email etiquette, Presentation skills, People skill Personality Traits Dedicated, Disciplined, Leadership, people skills, commitment  Experience  - 3 -5 years Location  - Indore, Onsite

Responsibilities :  - Design, develop, and maintain automated test suites using Selenium WebDriver and Python frameworks (e.g., pytest, unittest).  - Implement effective API testing and automation using REST APIs and Python libraries (e.g., requests).  - Collaborate with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and translate them into comprehensive test plans and test cases. - Analyze software functionalities, identify potential issues, and report defects effectively.  - Debug and troubleshoot automation scripts to ensure smooth test execution.  - Maintain and update existing test automation frameworks and libraries.  - Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in Selenium, Python testing libraries, and automation best practices.  - Contribute to the continuous improvement of the testing process and methodologies. Specific Skills  Required :  - 6-12 years of experience as a Selenium and Python developer.  - Strong understanding of software validation and automation principles. - Proficiency in Python programming with a deep knowledge of functions, classes, decorators, and object-oriented programming concepts.  - Hands-on experience with API testing and automation using REST APIs and Python libraries.  - Hands-on experience with web UI testing and automation using Selenium WebDriver and Python frameworks. - Familiarity with basic networking concepts and understanding of L2/L3 protocols (OSPF, ISIS, BGP, MPLS, Segment Routing etc), MPLS TE, L2VPN.  - Basic understanding of Git, Jenkins, and JMeter (or any other performance testing tools).  - Good understanding of test cycles, QA methodologies, and requirement analysis.  - Ability to write clear and concise test plans and test cases. column2: As a Senior QA Automation Engineer at Planful, you will play a critical role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software product through the design, development, and execution of automated testing solutions. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to implement testing strategies, identify defects, and drive continuous improvement in our software development lifecycle. This role offers an exciting opportunity to leverage your expertise in QA automation to contribute to the success of a high-growth software company and make a meaningful impact on our products and services.       Requirements         Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.     Proven experience (7+ years) as a Sr QA Automation Engineer or Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET), with a focus on test automation.     Strong proficiency in test automation frameworks and tools such as Selenium WebDriver, Cucumber, Cypress, or Appium.     Experience with programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript for test automation scripting.     Solid understanding of software testing principles, methodologies, and best practices.     Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automation tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or Travis CI.     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot complex issues and identify root causes.     Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.     Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies and experience working in an Agile development environment.     Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a high-pressure environment.         Responsibilities         Collaborate with product management, development, and QA teams to understand requirements and define test strategies and test plans.     Design, develop, and maintain automated test suites for functional, regression, and performance testing.     Implement and maintain test automation frameworks and tools to ensure efficient and reliable test execution.     Execute automated tests, analyze test results, and report defects in a timely manner, ensuring high-quality software releases.     Work closely with developers to reproduce and debug issues, providing detailed feedback and assisting in root cause analysis.     Participate in code reviews, providing feedback on testability, code quality, and automation coverage.     Continuously evaluate and improve test processes, tools, and methodologies to enhance overall efficiency and effectiveness.     Mentor junior QA engineers, sharing knowledge and best practices in test automation and quality assurance.     Stay updated on emerging trends, technologies, and best practices in QA automation, contributing to the technical growth and innovation of the team.

Participate in automation code reviews: Actively engage in automation code reviews to ensure the quality, efficiency, and scalability of automation frameworks and scripts. Provide constructive feedback and suggestions to peers to foster a collaborative and high-performing automation team.                     What is the leadership like for this roleWhat is the structure and culture of the team like       This role will be reporting to the Manager/Senior Manager of engineering. The team consists of highly competent senior and junior engineers working closely as a team. Our team s focus is on challenging the status quo by innovating but at the same time getting stuff done. We believe in building trust amongst team members, and all our stakeholders and committing to make our customers successful.      The team is organized based on modules to define clear responsibility and accountability. At the same time teams are fluid enough to own up whatever is needed for the larger product to be successful. The team is transparent in communication and helps each other for the success of the overall team. We believe engineers are the most valuable asset of our company and team. We put extra emphasis on providing a great work-life balance and having fun at work.           Where is this role located     Flexible: The role is considered flexible and will be a mix of working from a local VMware office and remote depending on your preferences and the arrangements determined with your future manager. You will be expected to live within a reasonable non-daily commute of the office. Medical Coverage, Retirement, and Parental Leave Plans for All Family Types     Generous Time Off Programs     40 hours of paid time to volunteer in your community. column2: Your role as a QA Automation Engineer is to write scripts and create automation environments for repeated tests.     Using automation tools (Selenium), you will design, test, and deploy effective test automation solutions. Skills Required:       Technical Skills       Require programming skills to write computer code and scripts in common computer languages, such as Javascript, Python     Suggest /Make framework enhancements to accommodate the scripting needs     Analytical skills Analytically examine bug reports, prioritize necessary tests, and streamline application functions through automated testing processes     Attention to detail Being detail oriented is required as you will test web and mobile applications to find ways to improve them and isolate problems     Communication skills Strong verbal communication skills to effectively collaborate with the engineering team and create testing plans and written reports showing errors        Tools:       Automation testing tools: Selenium     API testing tools that require strong coding skills to create tests: REST Assured, RestSharp, jMeter, etc.;     Continuous Integration tools - Jenkins, Bit bucket, Github     JIRA Defect tracking and task creation tool Responsibilities:     Write, execute and support automated tests by creating scripts that run testing functions automatically;     Maximize test coverage for the most critical features of the system;     Determine the priority for test scenarios and create execution plans to implement these scenarios;     Write documentation for automated processes including test plans, test procedures, and test cases;     Build test automation frameworks;     Log and document bugs in the tracking system;     Set up Continuous Integration. column2: Objectives We are seeking an experienced Automation Architect to lead automation initiatives for Agile projects within the insurance sector. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in end-to-end automation covering API, mobile, web, and desktop applications. This role requires expertise in automation tools such as Roboframework and programming languages like Python or Java. Additionally, the candidate must have experience leading automation teams across multiple projects and possess technical proficiency to support DevOps practices. Skills/Responsibilities Develop and implement end-to-end automation solutions for Agile projects within the insurance domain, covering API, mobile, web, and desktop applications. Lead the automation team in developing robust automation frameworks and scripts using tools like Roboframework and programming languages such as Python or Java. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand project requirements and define automation strategies that align with Agile methodologies. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to automation engineers, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards. Lead the evaluation and adoption of automation tools and technologies, staying abreast of industry trends and emerging practices. Develop and maintain a centralized repository of automation assets, including test scripts, frameworks, and documentation. Work closely with QA teams to integrate automation into the continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline. Support DevOps practices by providing technically sound solutions for automation integration with cloud platforms and CI/CD pipelines. Lead automation efforts for regression testing, performance testing, and other quality assurance activities. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for process improvement and automation efficiency. Communicate automation strategies, progress, and results to key stakeholders, including project managers and business leaders. Responsible for developing custom automation strategy for client specific testing requirements, architecting appropriate automation frameworks and applying automated tools to support application testing.  Provide End to end solution management (planning, design, development, risk management, resource and client management) Assess client environment at enterprise level and provide cross platform, cross tooling automation solutions that span across delivery models (waterfall/agile/DevOps).  Ensure alignment between the integration partners and vendors and help set test architecture priorities Ability to consult multiple projects / involve in presales and guide/mentor the automation team  Ability to identify technical needs for the team and work with learning and development team for their career growth and enable them to become full stack testers.  Optimize the test architecture and full lifecycle automation approach from unit test through system verification, in collaboration with the IT Dev Team.  Define automation API for the project and demonstrate the benefits to the client, showcasing how automation can improve efficiency, reduce time-to-market, and enhance overall product quality Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field; Master's degree preferred. Overall 12+ years experience and minimum of 7+ years of experience in automation architecture roles, with a focus on Agile projects within the insurance industry. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on innovation and continuous improvement. Familiarity with Agile methodologies and experience working in Agile project environments. Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and experience in integrating automation solutions with cloud services. Relevant certifications in automation testing, Agile methodologies, or cloud platforms are a plus. Advanced experience in one or more languages: C#, JavaScript, Java, Python, Ruby, VB Prior Experience in Dev Ops, Automated Deployments, Jenkins Pipelines, Containerization etc

column2: Job Title: Senior Software Systems Engineer Major Tasks: The Systems Engineer will be a member of the Engineering R&D team working on the Testing and support of medical devices. They will be working closely with other members of the engineering staff to provide technical solutions to engineering problems. The Systems Engineer will participate in the creation of design documentation, software code, test plans, Testing, Sustenance, Maintaining, other project artifacts and becoming Subject Matter Expert. Responsibilities: Participates, as a member of software project or sub-project team(s), in the Testing of software applications for product / test tools. Integration: Collaborate with hardware, software, and firmware teams to ensure the effective integration of system components. Verification and Validation: Develop and execute test plans to verify and validate system functionality, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards. Documentation: Generate and maintain comprehensive system documentation, including specifications, design documents, and test protocols. Collaboration: Work closely with multidisciplinary teams, including software engineers, hardware engineers, and quality assurance, to achieve project goals. Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal quality processes in software development. Conduct code reviews and contribute to the continuous improvement of software development practices. Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in software engineering. Adheres to defined Software and Medical procedures and processes. column2: Project Role : Test Automation Engineer Project Role Description : Transform testing into a continuous and efficient end-to-end quality engineering function through the use of quality processes, tools, and methodologies significantly improving control, accuracy and integrity. Evolve more predictive and intelligent testing approaches based on automation and innovative testing products and solutions.  Must have skills : Performance Testing Strategy Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Certification in JMeter Gatling Summary :As a Test Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for transforming testing into a continuous and efficient end-to-end quality engineering function through the use of quality processes, tools, and methodologies. Your typical day will involve developing and implementing performance testing strategies and evolving more predictive and intelligent testing approaches based on automation and innovative testing products and solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities: Develop and implement performance testing strategies to ensure the quality and reliability of software applications. Stay updated with the latest advancements in performance testing and automation, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Must To Have Skills:Proficiency in performance testing tools like JMeter, LoadRunner, and Gatling. Good To Have Skills:Experience with programming languages like Java and Python. Good To Have Skills:Knowledge of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies. Strong understanding of performance testing concepts and techniques. Experience in load, stress, and endurance testing. Experience in analyzing and interpreting performance test results. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in performance testing strategy. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful performance testing solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification Certification in JMeter Gatling

column2: We are looking for a skilled Automation Engineer to join Oracle Fusion Expenses Engineering Team with 6-10years of automation experience and Shift-left testing approach. Skills required are: TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js, Selenium and Appium. Performance testing tools will be a plus. We want people who work well in teams, think out of the box and work in new tech areas. Responsibilities: Design, develop, execute, and maintain automated test software, employing positive and negative testing techniques, for service functionality, monitoring, integration, performance, resiliency, security, scalability, and reliability. Understand the end-to-end configuration, technical dependencies, code paths, and overall behavioral characteristics of the services you test. Create test data and seed databases, according to the test plan specifications. Analyze and understand existing test coverage and test cases, identifying opportunities for redesign, replacement, reusability, and improvement in efficiency and performance. Apply software optimization techniques to redesign and augment existing automated tests, reducing technical debt for software test. Perform peer code reviews to improve the quality of the test code base and optimize its execution. Debug and triage test failures, using full-stack engineering, to isolate test defects from functional defects, and identify the service component causing the issue. ?Work?with service development?and release engineering to refine the service-specific automated test usage in the continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) flow. Write clear and reproducible software defect incident reports.? Identify and/or design modern automated test techniques to update and upgrade existing automated tests. Establish thorough functional, technical and architectural knowledge of the product and participate in functional design review and developer test case review to identify the testing gaps with?quality driven mindset. Influence and cultivate innovation within the team. Leading contributor individually and as a team member, providing direction and mentoring other automation engineers, implementing best practices of automation and technical processes. Skills and Qualifications: At least 6-10years of related?professional experience in Agile software development & testing across the full software life-cycle including design, implementation, testing, operations and maintenance. Proven track record of testing large scale applications, with?deep expertise in automation using?various technologies (e.g. Selenium Webdriver, TypeScript, JavaScript, Node.js), solutions and processes to support scalable and repeatable practices. Expense in building desktop , mobile automation frameworks. Strong Java programming skills and experience with other languages like Typescript,?JavaScript. Mobile application testing and?accessibility testing using BrowserStack or similar?cloud platforms. Experience in Test Management tools like ALM and CICD tools like Jenkins. Familiar with service-oriented architecture and?Experience with testing Microservices will be an added advantage. Working knowledge of SQL. Knowledge of professional software engineering best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, source control, build and release processes, continuous deployment, and test suite development and maintenance. Hands-on working experience with test processes, methodologies, tools, and technology, including unit, functional, integration, performance testing Familiar with Behavior-driven and/or Test-driven development.??Experience is a plus. Familiar with Intelligent Automation Testing, AI Machine Learning is a plus. Strong organizational, interpersonal, written and oral communication skills, with proven success in contributing in a collaborative, team-oriented environment, working with technical and non-technical peers, as well as management. Ability to work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environment. Selfmotivated and self-driven, continuously learning, and capable of working both independently and collaboratively BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent domain Ability to adjust to competing priorities and allocate your time as necessary to get the job done

column2: Revionics is seeking a talented QA Automation Engineer to join our dynamic team     The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated test scripts to ensure the quality and reliability of our software products     The QA Automation Engineer will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to identify test requirements, create comprehensive test plans, and implement automated testing solutions     This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the success of cutting-edge projects in a fast-paced, collaborative environment             Responsibilities:         Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using industry-standard tools and frameworks.     Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and define test scenarios.     Create detailed, comprehensive test plans and test cases to cover all aspects of software functionality, performance, and reliability.     Execute automated tests and analyze test results to identify defects, regressions, and performance issues.     Document defects found during testing, including steps to reproduce and expected vs. actual results.     Work closely with developers to troubleshoot and resolve issues in a timely manner.     Integrate automated tests into continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to enable frequent and reliable software releases.     Maintain and enhance the test automation framework to ensure scalability, reliability, and maintainability.     Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in software testing and test automation.     Provide technical assistance and mentorship to QA team members on test automation tools, frameworks, and processes.     Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and other agile ceremonies as part of a cross-functional development team.         Requirements:         Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.     2-5 years of experience in software quality assurance with a focus on test automation.     Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, Java, JavaScript, or C#.     Experience with test automation frameworks such as Selenium WebDriver, Appium, TestNG, JUnit, NUnit, etc     Knowledge of API testing tools like Postman, REST Assured, or SoapUI.     Familiarity with version control systems (eg, Git), continuous integration tools (eg, Jenkins, Travis CI), and issue tracking systems (eg, Jira).     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with meticulous attention to detail.     Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.     Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, agile environment.             We also look for             Passion     Initiative and a Pioneering Spirit     Quality orientation     Resourcefulness and application

column2: Project Role : Test Automation Engineer Project Role Description : Transform testing into a continuous and efficient end-to-end quality engineering function through the use of quality processes, tools, and methodologies significantly improving control, accuracy and integrity. Evolve more predictive and intelligent testing approaches based on automation and innovative testing products and solutions.  Must have skills : Test Management Good to have skills : Test Automation Strategy Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 Years Full Time Education Summary :As a Test Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for transforming testing into a continuous and efficient end-to-end quality engineering function through the use of quality processes, tools, and methodologies. Your typical day will involve developing and implementing test automation strategies, evolving more predictive and intelligent testing approaches, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure accuracy and integrity of the testing process.  Roles & Responsibilities: Develop and implement test automation strategies, including designing, coding, and executing automated test scripts using industry-standard tools and frameworks. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize test cases for automation, ensuring maximum test coverage and accuracy. Evolve more predictive and intelligent testing approaches based on automation and innovative testing products and solutions. Conduct root cause analysis of defects and issues, working with development teams to resolve them and improve overall product quality. Stay updated with the latest advancements in test automation and quality engineering, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in Test Management. Good To Have Skills:Experience in Test Automation Strategy. Solid understanding of software testing methodologies, tools, and processes. Experience in designing and executing test cases, test plans, and test scripts. Experience in defect tracking and reporting, including root cause analysis and resolution. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Test Management. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, engineering, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful quality engineering solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification 15 Years Full Time Education

column2: Mindstix is looking for a proficient Web Automation QA who is passionate about their work and committed to delivering exceptional quality by automating the Web and mWeb application end to end. This role is more focused on web automation QA and requires proficiency in designing automated testing solutions across web-based applications. The candidate should possess expertise in web automation, and test automation frameworks, a deep understanding of testing methodologies, and hands-on experience in both frontend and backend testing. The person may play a pivotal role in leading our QA teams to plan, design and maintain a top-quality application to bring digital transformation to our global enterprise and start-up customers.       Roles and Responsibilities         Design, develop, and execute robust automated test scripts for web applications across different browsers.              Leverage leading-edge tools and frameworks to ensure the accuracy and efficiency of test processes.              Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure comprehensive test coverage.              Conduct performance testing to ensure web applications meet performance benchmarks and user experience expectations.              Create and maintain documentation for test cases, test scripts, and testing processes. Report defects and issues with clear and concise details.              Aligning with Agile & DevOps methodologies and using tools like JMeter and frameworks like Rest Assured, Selenium Webdriver, WebdriverIO etc. to meet the industry standards for web automation.          Must Have           Expertise in Test Automation:    Experience in designing and implementing robust automated test scripts for complex web applications. Proficiency in programming languages like Java, and JS for writing automation test scripts.                Communication Skills:    Exceptional proficiency in both written and spoken English. Ability to collaborate effectively with international teams and stakeholders. Excellent communication skills to liaise with technical and non-technical stakeholders.                Automation Tools:    Strong proficiency in automation tools (e.g., XCTest, Jmeter, K6).                Testing Methodologies:    Strong understanding of testing methodologies, including both manual and automated approaches.                Test Frameworks:    Sound knowledge of Selenium Test Environment Setup (Maven Integration, Selenium WebDriver, Java, TestNG, Jenkins Integration etc.)                Problem Solving:    Strong troubleshooting skills to identify and address complex technical issues. Proposing and implementing effective solutions for application development challenges.          Good to Have           Knowledge of Cloud Platforms:    Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure) for scalable and distributed testing.               Security Testing Awareness:    Awareness of security testing principles and tools for identifying vulnerabilities.                Web understanding:    Basic understanding of certain markup/scripting/programming languages, required for the automation (e.g. JSON, HTML/CSS, XML).                CI/CD:    Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and integrating automated tests into the development process.          Qualifications and Skills         Bachelor s or master s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or allied streams.              2 to 5 years of hands-on industry experience in Quality Assurance as an Automation engineer.              Knowledge of the Agile and DevOps approaches.              Certifications are an added advantage              Excellent reporting, time management, analytical & communication capabilities          Who Fits Best?         You are a passionate QA with a flair for automating complex functionalities.              You enjoy working in a fast-paced creative environment.              You love to express ideas and articulate well with strong written and verbal English & Spanish communication skills.              You thrive in a customer-centric environment with the ability to actively listen, empathise, and collaborate with globally distributed teams.              You are a team player who desires to mentor and inspire others to do their best.              You love to express ideas and articulate well with strong written and verbal English communication skills.              You are detail-oriented with an appreciation for craftsmanship at work.
