column2: Senior QA Engineer will be responsible for assuring high quality of application by planning and execution tests driven by automation and close coordination with development and business team, understanding functional and non-functional aspects, creating, maintaining, and advocating for appropriate testing framework and platforms, and keeping up with technological changes     Work in close collaboration with stakeholders, grow your network and get ready for future global roles at Siemens Energy             How you'll Make an Impact / Responsibilities           Develop and manage all aspects of the testing effort, including plans, inter dependencies, schedule, budget, tools, and required personnel.         Create maintain test cases, metrics strategy, test plan, QA project plan, traceability matrix, entry exit criteria, and test data documents.         Collaborate with the Product Development team to ensure consistent project execution.         Drive adoption of automation and increase penetration of automation including Automation tool proposals, hands-on on POC creation, drive the Automation initiatives.         Drive the regression testing approach, automate regression bed, risk-based testing as per the sprint cycles.         Define and drive the QA/Automation metrices, ensure SLA adherence per contracts.         Liaison between business and QA teams to deliver value streams.         Admin set-up for the account to start Offshore QA Delivery Centre, ramping up the team.         Facilitate cross-training and utilization of resources achieve multi-skilling in teams to drive productivity improvements.         Innovation Automation Initiatives; provide continuous improvement strategies for increasing productivity and reducing cost to serve.         Investigate product quality to make improvements to achieve better customer satisfaction.         Staffing process, including resource need assessment, hiring, work allocation, progress reporting, career mentorship and promotion recommendations         Allocate offshore resources to different projects and assigned tasks deadlines based on the project work plan.         Review the documentation and tasks performed by the peer team members and provided feedback as and when needed.               What You Bring / Skills, Capabilities         8+ years of IT professional experience post-graduation in Engineering or other equivalent qualification (MCA).       Minimum of 4+ years of working experience on Robot/Selenium framework.         Must have exposure to functional testing, API testing and integration testing.         Candidate should be capable of working independently or within a team.         Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to effectively collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders from round the globe.             Working knowledge on the following topics is a must:                   Expertise in Robot/Selenium Automation Framework for both web and windows-based applications and APIs.     Expertise in creating automation testing framework from scratch using python.     Fundamental knowledge of OOPs Concept and design patterns.     Good knowledge of various editors.     Good knowledge of Robot framework core libraries/Selenium libraries     Knowledge of various testing tools like Postman and JMeter.     Knowledge of code versioning tools (GIT).     Knowledge of any issue/defect tracking tool eg JIRA etc     Familiarity with SQL, Oracle and NoSQL databases and hands on experience on writing PL/SQL queries.       emphasizing iterative and incremental testing throughout development, close collaboration between testers, developers, and stakeholders, enabling continuous feedback and frequent testing cycles.       Proven ability to work in a fast-paced environment and prioritize multiple tasks effectively.           Good to have skills.                   Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline       Ability to work in a cross-platform environment.           Rewards/Benefits         Under our motto #BetterTogether, we offer our employees the opportunity to work flexibly and remotely. But our offices also leave nothing to be desired and offer space for inspiring collaboration and creativity.        Our people are our most valuable asset. We in Siemens Energy care for your good health wellbeing. Accordingly, we offer Home Collection based Preventive Health Check-up to our employees and their family.         The professional and personal development of our employees is very important to us. We give them the opportunity to learn and develop in a self-determined way. Various attractive programmes and measures are available for this purpose.         Flexi Pay empowers employees with the choice to customize the amount in some of the salary components within a defined range thereby optimizing the tax benefits. Accordingly, each employee is empowered to decide on the best Possible net income out of the same fixed individual base pay on a monthly basis.

column2: And now, we are on the lookout for a great Senior QA who will be responsible for developing and implementing test plans, conducting manual and automated testing, identifying, and documenting defects, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions. You will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software/products. Below is a list of the background we would like our Senior QA to have: 1. An Engineering or masters degree from a reputed university 2. 3-5 year of experience in manual End to End functional testing of web Applications including front end UI, API and backend databases like Elastic Search, MySQL, Mongo DB etc. 3. Strong testing skills with a good grasp of testing methodologies and techniques. Preferably Agile  4. Proficient in Front-end automated testing using Selenium. 5. Proficient in backend manual testing and automated testing using Postman or Rest assured. 6. Knowledgeable in creating Test Plans and Test strategies to go with an Agile development team. 7. Should have good written communication skills to document test cases and scenarios. 8. Should have good verbal communication skills to work with the developers. 9. Should be able to create testing projects from scratch. 10. Should be able to work as an individual QA contributor in a team of Developers. 11. Should be able to work in an Agile environment. As a Senior QA at Infrrd, your job responsibilities will include: 1. Define Test Strategy for Product Features & Customer Projects 2. Develop and execute detailed, comprehensive test plans and test cases., Traceability Matrix and Bug Reports 3. Conduct both manual and automated testing to ensure the functionality, usability, and performance of our software/products.  4. Collaborate with development, product management, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and identify potential areas of improvement.  5. Participate in the design and implementation of test automation frameworks. Review automation PRs and help the team with automation when needed.  6. Investigate and document defects, working closely with development teams to ensure timely resolution. 7. Coordinate release cycles with different development teams.  8. Perform regression testing to validate new releases and updates. Provide sign Off on Tests from different development environments - SIT, QA, UAT to move the application between environments. 9. Contribute as an individual whenever the project needs it 10. Mentor and provide guidance to junior QA team members. 11. Stay up to date with industry best practices and emerging testing tools and technologies. 12. Having an experience of working in a Product Team - Good to Have And along with that, someone who is curious to learn, drives the whole team to perform better and is a cool person to work with. That is when we will make a great team together, right? Look forward to speaking with you.

column2: Responsible for leading engineering of software quality for an enterprise level product development in a highly regulated environment. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Serve as a Team lead for a software quality engineer team comprising automation engineers and manual testers contributing to software quality in the context of a fast paced, Agile development process. Oversees completion of tasks of the Quality Engineering team on time and within budget. Resolves prioritization and assignment issues and provides performance mentorship to team members. column2: We are currently seeking a highly skilled QA Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a QA Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality of our products and services.     In this position, you will be responsible for designing and implementing test plans, identifying and reporting bugs, and collaborating with developers and other stakeholders to ensure timely and effective resolution of issues. You will also work closely   with our product team to ensure that our products meet our high standards for functionality, usability, and reliability.     The ideal candidate for this position will have a strong background in software testing and quality assurance, with experience in both manual and automated testing. You should also have experience working in an agile development environment and be   able to communicate effectively with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders.     Responsibilities:       Develop and implement test plans: QA Engineers are responsible for developing and implementing test plans, test cases, and test scripts that ensure the quality of software products and services.         Conduct manual and automated testing: QA Engineers conduct both manual and automated testing to identify defects or bugs in the software. They may use a variety of testing tools, frameworks, and methodologies to test the software.         Collaborate with cross-functional teams: QA Engineers work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure timely and effective resolution of issues.         Analyze test results: QA Engineers analyze test results and provide feedback to the development team on the quality of the software, and suggest improvements or changes to ensure quality.         Develop and maintain testing environments: QA Engineers are responsible for setting up and maintaining testing environments, ensuring that the software is tested under the appropriate conditions.         Document defects and testing results: QA Engineers document defects and testing results to help the development team to identify and fix issues.         Ensure compliance with quality standards: QA Engineers ensure that the software is compliant with quality standards, such as ISO or CMMI, and follow best practices in testing and quality assurance.       Requirements:       Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.         Experience in software testing, quality assurance, or a related field.         Familiarity with testing methodologies, such as Agile and Waterfall.         Knowledge of testing tools, such as Selenium, Appium, JMeter, or TestNG.         Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and problem-solving abilities.         Excellent written and verbal communication skills.         Ability to work independently or in a team environment.         Experience with source code management tools, such as Git or SVN.         Familiarity with at least one programming language, such as Java, Python, or JavaScript.         Understanding of database technologies, such as SQL or NoSQL databases.       Skills:       Strong knowledge of software testing principles and methodologies.         Ability to write and execute test plans and test cases.         Familiarity with bug tracking tools, such as JIRA or Bugzilla.         Experience with test automation frameworks, such as Robot Framework or Appium.         Understanding of web technologies, such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.         Knowledge of API testing tools, such as Postman or SoapUI.         Familiarity with performance testing tools, such as LoadRunner or JMeter.         Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with changing priorities.         Good time management and organizational skills.         Ability to continuously learn and adapt to new technologies and testing practices.
column11: Testing tools, Javascript, Performance testing, Agile, CMMI, HTML, Selenium, Information technology, SQL, Python

column2: As an SDET Engineer at Trimble, you will play a critical role in ensuring the reliability, performance, and quality of our software products. You will work closely with our development and quality assurance teams to design, develop, and maintain automated test frameworks and test suites. Your expertise in automation scripting will be instrumental in delivering software that meets our high standards.       What You Will Do         Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand product requirements and create test plans and strategies.     Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts and frameworks to validate software functionality, performance, and scalability.     Perform manual testing when necessary and create test cases and test data.     Identify and report software defects, track their resolution, and verify fixes.     Perform code reviews to ensure testability and code quality within the team.     Continuously research and implement industry best practices in test automation and quality assurance.     Monitor and analyze test results, providing insights and recommendations for improving software quality.     Collaborate with developers to integrate automated testing into the continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline.     Participate in release planning and provide risk assessment based on test results and also support the release whenever its required.     Mentor junior members of the testing team and promote a culture of quality throughout the organization.             What Skills Experience You Should Bring         Relevant work experience of 3 to 6 years of in the related field.     Proven experience as an SDET or similar role in software testing and automation.     Proficiency in any of the programming languages such as C#(Preferred), or Java or Python.     Experience with test automation frameworks and tools like Selenium(Mandatory), Specflow, Coypu, Appium, XUnit, Xamarin etc.     Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies and best practices.     Familiarity with cloud platforms like Azure, AWS and Saucelabs.     Familiarity with version control systems like Git,TFS, Azure DevOps and CI/CD pipelines.     Familiarity with Test Management tools like JIRA and Confluence     Familiarity with Agile/Scrum, Kanban methodologies.     Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.     Strong communication and teamwork skills.     Ability to work independently under different timezones and take ownership of testing initiatives.             Qualifications         Bachelors in Computer Science or any related Engineering degree.

column1: Mid-Level Quality Assurance Automation Test Engineer
column2: We are looking for a Mid-level Quality Assurance Automaton Test Engineer responsible for the execution of system testing on a simple to complex websites, and web applications using test scripts in selenium using JAVA.          The QA engineer must be able to work collaboratively within the software development team and business units to execute and validate test cases-based system requirements.          This position ensures the quality, reliability, integrity, and performance of all software products produced for end user s consumption.                 Responsibilities:             Review functional and design specifications to ensure full understanding of individual deliverables.         Ensure that validated deliverables meet functional and design specifications and requirements.         Identify and write test scenarios and test cases from user stories and acceptance criteria.         Isolate, replicate, and document/report defects and verify defect fixes.         Execute and evaluate manual or automated test cases and report test results.         Participate in test plan/case reviews with cross-functional team members.         Clearly understand the difference between missed requirements, development bugs, production defects, and backlog items.          Develop, document, and maintain functional test cases and other test artifacts such as test data, data validation, scripts, and more.         Identify any potential quality issues per defined process and escalate potential quality issues immediately to management.         Participate in the improvement of the quality assurance process, deliverables, and methodologies.                 Requirements:             Candidate should have more than 3+ years of experience in Manual testing with 2+ years into Automation testing, Developing and executing test cases, and test scripts.         QA Automation Candidate with experience in Selenium (using Java) framework.         Testing, Maven, Data-driven Framework knowledge is required.         Proficient in different types of Testing like Integration, Regression, Smoke Sanity, User Acceptance testing etcProficient in different types of Testing like Integration, Regression, Smoke Sanity, User Acceptance testing etc         Should have knowledge of Defect Management, Bug life cycle, Performance management using ALM tool. Good Understanding of Soap rest tool.         Exposure with working in Agile/Scrum environment.         Understanding of QA metrics and reporting.         Should have excellent written and verbal Communication Skills work independently in a team with a high level of quality.         Creation and execution of test cases, test scenarios, test plan, test scripts for manual automated testing.         Bachelors in computer science or similar relevant field.Ability to work in a highly dynamic and fast-paced environments.Ability to focus on deadlines and deliverables.                 Benefits:             Paid medical insurance with COVID-19 coverage right from the first day       Get up to 32 days of paid time off, monthly short leaves, marriage leaves, and additional unpaid vacation leaves.       Annual salary increases with a predictable percentage increase based on performance review.         Annual year-end bonus and monthly bonuses based on performance.         Able to work from home 1 day per week, every week.         Earn as much as INR 20,000 from the employee referral program.         Happy Hour every Friday Free meal every Friday with an extra hour of break time to bond with the team and participate in games and activities.         Annual team-building Shift gears and explore adventures with the team out of the office!         Career development plans We want you to grow and become the best at what you love.         Casual wear in the office Express your fashion or stay comfy!         Flat organization with an open door policy.         Company paid certifications and trainings.

column2: QA Engineer - Manual & Automation Testing   Experience:  4+ years Salary:  USD 1,280 - 1,520 / month Expected Notice Period : 2 to 4 Weeks Shift : 1:00PM to 10:00PM IST Opportunity Type:  Remote Placement Type:  Contractual Contract Duration:  Full-Time, 12 Months   (*Note: This is a requirement for one of Uplers' clients)   What do you need for this opportunity? Must have skills required : Manual Test, Selenium, Automation Testing, Quality Assurance Good to have skills : Security Testing, Azure   Our Hiring Partner is Looking for : QA Engineer - Manual & Automation Testing who is passionate about their work, eager to learn and grow, and who is committed to delivering exceptional results. If you are a team player, with a positive attitude and a desire to make a difference, then we want to hear from you.   Roles and Responsibilities : As a QA Engineer in our dynamic team, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our software applications through a combination of manual and automation testing. Your responsibilities will include:   Test Planning and Execution: Collaborate with the development team to understand project requirements and design comprehensive test plans. Develop, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases and scripts for functional, regression, and performance testing. Automation Framework Development: Leverage your expertise (4+ years) in developing and maintaining automated test suites and frameworks for software applications. Ensure the scalability and efficiency of automated testing processes. Test Environment Management: Manage test environments, ensuring they are properly configured and reflective of production conditions. Maintain up-to-date documentation of test plans, test cases, and test results. Collaboration in SDLC: Actively participate in the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to release. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to address and resolve quality issues. Quality Standards and Ownership: Uphold high standards of software quality through a strong sense of ownership. Balance the need for fast execution with the establishment of scalable testing practices. Continuous Learning and Adaptation: Demonstrate a proactive attitude towards learning and adapting to new tools, technologies, and methodologies. Stay updated on industry best practices and incorporate them into the testing process. Requirements : Required Skills/Experience: 4+ years of experience in developing and maintaining automated test suites and frameworks for functional, regression and performance testing of software applications. Proficient in designing, developing and executing manual and automated test cases and test scripts for new features and functionality. Experience in managing test environments and maintaining up-to-date documentation of test plans and results. Collaborate in the entire software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to release. Strong sense of ownership and focus on upholding high standards A collaborative attitude, team player, friendly, with passion and flexibility to learn new tools and skillsets Desired Skills/Experience: Wholesale or eCommerce industry experience Experience in programming languages such as Java, Python, or similar. Knowledge of software development lifecycle methodologies, including Agile and Scrum. Experience with load and performance testing. Familiarity with cloud-based testing platforms. Knowledge of security testing and tools. Preferred Industry Experience Retail Industry Preferred Candidate If you're a collaborative, team-oriented individual with a passion for quality assurance and a commitment to continuous improvement, we welcome you to join our team.   Ideal Talent Persona Individual contributor who can work in a team and collaborate with each team member whenever required to achieve business goals Go-getter attitude Trustworthiness and integrity Ownership and complete accountability of work Respect the team  Needs to have good communication and ability to express views with respect and humbleness Taking responsibility of the task, be proactive in asking updates so that work gets completed in time Very cautious about choice of words and body language One who takes this role very seriously and not as a side kick Proactiveness in terms of telling availability and non-availability for any reason How to apply for this opportunity? Register or login on our portal & fill out the application Clear the given AI Screening (30 min) and Click on Apply to get shortlisted Our team of talent matchmakers will matchmake you with the client Crack a quick interview with our client Land your global dream job and get your exciting career started!   About our Hiring Partner: The Company is very much a family-owned business and has a core of nine depots around London and the Midlands. Wembley, Barking, Enfield, Croydon, Watford, Hayes, Lewisham, Leicester and Birmingham depots each average around 100,000 sq. ft. of well-lit floor space. All are open seven days a week and all stock over 12,000 products across the following key areas: Grocery, Soft Drinks, Confectionery, Toiletries & Household Goods, Wines & Spirits, Beers & Ciders and Tobacco.   About Uplers: Our goal is to make hiring reliable, simple, and fast. Our role will be to help all our talents find and apply for relevant opportunities and progress in their career. We will support any grievances or challenges you may face during the engagement. You will also be assigned to a dedicated Talent Success Coach during the engagement.    ( Note:  There are many more opportunities apart from this on the portal. Depending on the assessments you clear, you can apply for them as well).    So, if you are ready for a new challenge, a great work environment, and an opportunity to take your career to the next level, don't hesitate to apply today. We are waiting for you!

column2: Role & responsibilities:  As a QA Automation Engineer with a focus on Networking Background, Kubernetes, Linux/Unix Preference, and Scripting Language expertise, your responsibilities would include: Designing and Developing Automated Tests: Create automated test scripts and frameworks specifically tailored for networking components, Kubernetes deployments, and Linux/Unix-based environments. This involves understanding networking protocols, Kubernetes architecture, and system administration in Linux/Unix. Testing Networking Functionality: Conduct thorough testing of networking features and functionalities, including but not limited to network configurations, routing, switching, load balancing, and security protocols. Validate networking components' interoperability within Kubernetes clusters. Automating Deployment and Configuration: Develop scripts and automation tools to streamline the deployment and configuration of networking infrastructure, Kubernetes clusters, and associated services. Ensure smooth integration and compatibility with existing systems. Performance Testing and Optimization: Perform performance testing of networking solutions to identify bottlenecks, latency issues, and scalability concerns. Optimize network configurations and Kubernetes deployments for improved efficiency and reliability. Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing, deployment, and monitoring of networking-related software and infrastructure changes. Integrate automated tests into CI/CD workflows to ensure rapid and reliable delivery. Monitoring and Troubleshooting: Set up monitoring tools and alerts to proactively identify network issues, performance degradation, and security vulnerabilities. Troubleshoot networking problems in Kubernetes environments and Linux/Unix systems, collaborating with developers and system administrators as needed. Documentation and Reporting: Document test plans, procedures, and results for both manual and automated tests. Prepare comprehensive reports on test coverage, results, and recommendations for improvements. Communicate findings to stakeholders and team members effectively. column2: When visionary companies need to know how their world-changing ideas will perform, they close the gap between design and reality with Ansys simulation. For more than 50 years, Ansys software has enabled innovators across industries to push boundaries by using the predictive power of simulation. From sustainable transportation to advanced semiconductors, from satellite systems to life-saving medical devices, the next great leaps in human advancement will be powered by Ansys. Innovate With Ansys, Power Your Career.   Summary / Role Purpose The R&D Verification Engineer II joins the MBU to conduct software testing of ANSYS applications such as Workbench Mechanical for different structural systems. This role assesses how well the product meets customer needs both in terms of functionality and usability and ensures that product requirements and quality standards are satisfied. The role works closely with other members of the product creation team and communicates with technical specialists on product issues.? The R&D verification engineer will research new engineering features in order to create analytical and user scenario test cases to evaluate the functionality and performance of capabilities being added to our engineering simulation software. This person participates in requirements planning, design reviews and investigating defects.  Key Duties and Responsibilities Specify and write test cases, creates, modify and update existing tests, write and maintain test scripts?? Perform functional, application, regression and performance testing in manual and/or automated test environments and investigate possible causes of problems Create test plans,?participate in defect management and testing metrics Apply standard techniques and procedures and comply with the company's overall development and testing processes Work in a variety of computing environments: Windows, Linux, VMs, Compute Clusters, Cloud Analyzes requirements and develops tests suitable for new features within the appropriate environment Participates in design and code reviews Tests products at all levels: Workflow, Unit, Application, Performance Investigates possible causes of problems Writes and maintains test scripts May write code for software testing tools Creates metrics and monitoring systems that are used for early detection of defects Works closely with other members of the product creation team and communicates with technical support specialists on product issues Coordinates with other teams to address cross-team dependencies  Minimum Education/Certification Requirements and Experience Masters degree in Mechanical or Civil or Structural Engineering or related field with 3 to 6 years of experience Strong knowledge of structural and computational mechanics Experience and/or academic exposure with FEA and CAE tools with knowledge of FE methods Proficient in one or more programming or scripting languages: Python, C++, C#, Jscript A thorough and careful approach to work; close attention to details and quality; strong organizational skills Ability to establish good working relationships with Development, Testing, and Support staff Excellent written and oral communication skills in the English language Able to troubleshoot by simplifying complex systems, debugging, and finding root causes Preferred Qualifications and Skills Technical knowledge and experience with Finite Element Analysis software. Experience in a large-scale commercial software testing and verification environment Good communication and interpersonal skills Ability to learn quickly and to collaborate with others in a geographically distributed team Experience with ANSYS structural mechanics products would be a clear advantage Basic understanding of software testing and verification processes Additional knowledge of numerical methods is desired Strong programming skill is highly desirable Experience with both LINUX and Windows platforms preferred Competent in the use of general office software applications such as mail tools, document editors, spreadsheets and databases Familiarity with Cloud (AWS, azure) is an added advantage At Ansys, we know that changing the world takes vision, skill, and each other. We fuel new ideas, build relationships, and help each other realize our greatest potential in the knowledge that every day is an opportunity to observe, teach, inspire, and be inspired. Together as One Ansys, we are powering innovation that drives human advancement. Our Commitments: Amaze with innovative products and solutions Make our customers incredibly successful Act with integrity Ensure employees thrive and shareholders prosper Our Values: Adaptability: Be open, welcome what's next Courage: Be courageous, move forward passionately Generosity: Be generous, share, listen, serve Authenticity: Be you, make us stronger Our Actions: We commit to audacious goals We work seamlessly as a team We demonstrate mastery We deliver outstanding results OUR ONE ANSYS CULTURE HAS INCLUSION AT ITS CORE We believe diverse thinking leads to better outcomes. We are committed to creating and nurturing a workplace that fuels this by welcoming people, no matter their background, identity, or experience, to a workplace where they are valued and where diversity, inclusion, equity, and belonging thrive. At Ansys, you will find yourself among the sharpest minds and most visionary leaders across the globe. Collectively we strive to change the world with innovative technology and transformational solutions. With a prestigious reputation in working with well-known, world-class companies, standards at Ansys are high met by those willing to rise to the occasion and meet those challenges head on. Our team is passionate about pushing the limits of world-class simulation technology, empowering our customers to turn their design concepts into successful, innovative products faster and at a lower cost. At Ansys, it's about the learning, the discovery, and the collaboration. It's about what is next as much as the mission accomplished. And it's about the melding of disciplined intellect with strategic direction and results that have, can, and do impact real people in real ways. All this is forged within a working environment built on respect, autonomy, and ethics. CREATING A PLACE WE'RE PROUD TO BE Ansys is an S&P 500 company and a member of the NASDAQ-100. We are proud to have been recognized for the following more recent awards, although our list goes on: Americas Most Loved Workplaces, Gold Stevie Award Winner, Americas Most Responsible Companies, Fast Company World Changing Ideas, Great Place to Work Certified (China, Greece, France, India, Japan, Korea, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, U.K.). For more information, please visit us at www.ansys.com Ansys is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics. Ansys does not accept unsolicited referrals for vacancies, and any unsolicited referral will become the property of Ansys. Upon hire, no fee will be owed to the agency, person, or entity.

column2: Business critical reason: In order to ensure seamless consumer journeys in our own retail stores we need to ensure we do not have defects in our applications that can break the consumer journey. Therefore a minimum testing team is required to keep system running and to ensure from OS patches, network changes, new hardware as well as changes on the applications like fiscal topics on PoS or maintenance on the SaaS solution for Workforce Management are tested and can be released to production.                   Overview:                    Within Digital Retail only quality assured products are released to production. The testing is carried out for OS patches, new images, new hardware, etc. as part of keep the system running but could also be engagements for one of the various rollout projects to our own retail stores.                 The project has the purpose to have a seamless consumer journey in the retail stores including stock accuracy and merchandise management processes to ensure products are available to adidas consumers, a seamless checkout experience at the point of sales, apps that support the store stuff to consult the consumers or workforce management systems that ensure adidas has the right amount of staff at the right time in place to serve consumer needs. Due to the project testing digital retail these consumer journeys do not break due to technical issues.                     Tasks:                     Analyze requirements or test cases and write the BDD test steps in a reusable way                 Write test automation in Java for web-, fat client and mobile applications using the adidas framework                 Configure Jenkins jobs to execute test automation frequently                 Configure Jenkins job for manual triggering with parameters                 Monitor the Sonar report for the repositories and fix raised exceptions                 Perform peer code reviews for code of the colleagues                 Ensure test results of executions are uploaded to reportportal and Jira Xray                 Classify defects in reportgportal on a daily base and define measure to fix root causes for frequently failing scripts (the goal is a script stability of +90% over 7 days)                 Document basic informations and design decisions on confluence                 Participate in daily standup meetings                 Participate on sprint planning meetings                 Participate in backlog refinement sessions                 Participate in sprint review meetings                 If needed participate in knowledge transfer sessions to learn about new topics/requirements within the test team or with tech consultants from other teams (internal or external)

column1: Sr. Embedded Software Testing Engineer For Top MNC
column2: LRR Technologies is currently hiring talented people to work with Carrier Corporation. Carrier Corporation (NYSE: CARR) is a global provider of innovative heating, ventilating, and air conditioning (HVAC), refrigeration, fire, security, and building automation technologies boasting annual sales of over $20 billion, with 58,000 employees spread across 160+ countries. For its R&D center in Hyderabad, Carrier is looking for a talented Embedded QA.  Work as part of a team & perform validation of Embedded Software for New product development/sustenance programs. Deliver the product with quality.     Key Responsibilities: QA Engineer supporting the continued design, development, and quality delivery of firmware  releases for the Carrier Refrigeration domain products. Good knowledge of end-to-end embedded product testing or embedded product Life cycle. Good at manual and automated test execution. Good understanding of SDLC, and bug life cycle. Should be able to co-ordinate with the stakeholder team and drive the status calls. Demonstrated ability in the testing process and embrace the latest testing trends in the market. Experience in understanding requirements traceability matrix & and validating system interface at the consumer level. Basic Programming skills in C, C++ &, and AMP; any Scripting languages. Good working experience in Python programming language should be able to debug the existing and create new scripts. Should be able to understand the schematic to debug any hardware-level issues. Should have hands-on with measuring devices (Oscilloscope, Multimeter, etc). Experience in testing different communication protocols such as CAN, IP RS 232/485, etc. Good knowledge of any Test Management tool. Good experience in Performing Regression Testing to verify and uncover new errors in legacy code after changes have been made. Create, Document, and Execute the test cases that conform to the technical and functional specifications for firmware and Software applications. Document and present test results as per the QA policies and procedures. Contributes ideas on product and process improvements. Participates in design review sessions. Implements appropriate automation technologies to meet the short and long-term goals of the company. Adhere to the Automation Framework for Carrier products and enhancements. Academic Qualifications/Requirements : Bachelors or Masters degree in Engineering (Electronics/Electrical/Computers/MCA) 4 to 7 years experience. Knowledge/Skills/Abilities: Self-starting/self-motivating individual, able to plan and achieve goals with minimal supervision. Must have good written and verbal communication skills and should be Organized, Punctual, and pay Attention to detail. Can handle multiple activities at once to accomplish goals. Handling multiple projects. Working closely with the development team to resolve issues. Follow the QA process. General : Ethics: Drives ethical business practices in all areas of responsibility/geography. Communication: Expresses ideas effectively to establish oneself as a credible and impactful leader. Team Work: Creates an environment in which people are involved, included, and have a sense of ownership Analytical Thinking: Identifies root causes of problems, secures relevant information, and identifies possible solutions. Adaptability: Adjusts personally to high pressure, rapidly changing business conditions, and uncertain business environments. Perks and benefits   This position will pay quite well - Rs. 22- 28 lakh per annum is the band, and the final amount may be even higher depending on your experience and expertise. if made an offer, you will need to join in 4 weeks. This is a lifetime opportunity for people looking to specialize in highly coveted niche futuristic skills and to work in a top multinational company with excellent employee-first initiatives. We look forward to your application.
column11: Embedded Testing, python, Embedded Software Testing, Refrigeration, Oscilloscope, can, c++, c, Multimeter

column2: Job Summary This role is responsible for leading functional project teams to oversee the entire testing process. The role ensures adherence to testing guidelines and standards, and analyzes test data to provide actionable insights. The role applies advanced subject matter knowledge to improve product quality, mitigate risks, and drive innovation. Responsibilities Leads and provides expertise to functional project teams of other test engineers and internal and outsourced test partners responsible for all stages of systems, equipment, and device testing, including solution and test plan design, validation, tooling, test execution and results evaluation. Expands relationships with internal and outsourced partners for systems, equipment, and device testing. Reviews and evaluates product designs and project activities for compliance with technology and testing guidelines and standards. Analyzes and interprets test and compliance data and prepares technical reports for use by other engineering, and management personnel. Resolves test yield problems by performing analysis of root causes, developing, and coordinating corrective action measures. Provides tangible feedback based on results to improve product quality and mitigate risk of product failure. Provides domain-specific expertise and overall test engineering leadership and perspective to cross- organization projects, programs, and activities. Applies advanced subject matter knowledge, and contributes to other complex projects, and exercises independent judgment in resolving business issues and establishing policies. Drives innovation and integration of new technologies into projects and activities in the test engineering organization. Provides guidance and mentoring to less- experienced staff members to set an example of test engineering design and development innovation and excellence. Education & Experience  Recommended Four-year or Graduate Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Electrical Engineering, or any other related discipline or commensurate work experience or demonstrated competence. Typically has 7-10 years of work experience, preferably in debug and validation, or a related field. Knowledge & Skills Agile Methodology Automation Computer Science Debugging Electrical Engineering Java (Programming Language) Jenkins JIRA New Product Development Python (Programming Language) Scripting Scrum (Software Development) Selenium (Software) Software Development Software Testing SQL (Programming Language) Test Automation Test Engineering Test Equipment Test Planning Cross-Org Skills Effective Communication Results Orientation Learning Agility Digital Fluency Customer Centricity Impact & Scope Impacts function and leads and/or provides expertise to functional project teams and may participate in cross-functional initiatives. Complexity Works on complex problems where analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of multiple factors. Shift - No shift premium (India)
column11: Test Engineering, Jenkins, Java, Automation, Test Automation, New Product Development, Debugging, Software Testing, Selenium, JIRA, Python

column1: Lead Engineer - QA Automation (Test Sigma, Appium/API)
column2: Lead engineer at Carrier Digital, you ll grow to lead high-performance software engineering teams that consistently deliver on commitments with continuous quality and efficiency improvements. In this role, you will develop technical capabilities for several of Carrier s software development teams, supporting both current and next-generation technology initiatives. This position requires a demonstrated, hands-on technical person with the ability delivery technical tasks and guide Spark candidates and coach software engineers and owns development phase of software development, including coding, troubleshooting, deployment, and ongoing maintenance.      Key Responsibilities         Perform technical analysis and should know how to test design enterprise-level systems.      Should know how to test, automate systems, processes, procedures to deliver a high-quality application.      Must work as Scam master for given project and conduct scam ceremonies and improve on agile metrics.      Must work with other members of a team and other departments to establish healthy communication and information flow.      Should know how to deliver a high-performing solution architecture that can support the development efforts of a business.      Plan, design, and test the most typical business solutions as needed. Prepare technical documents and other presentations for multiple solutions areas. Ensure that the best practices for configuration management are carried out as it was needed.      Must work on customer specifications, analyze them, and conduct the best product recommendations associated with the platform.      Must initiate a healthy discussion with the client and update them from time to time on the progress of a project.      Must understand the Company needs and architecture so that he can define the system specifications accordingly.      Responsible for planning, designing, and developing the solution architecture. Must communicate requirements of a system to the IT team.      Analyze and decide the best hardware and software products for integration. Responsible for the assigned program and mentor the other members of a team and support when technical issues arise.      Ensure that infrastructure and architecture are well implemented. Must address technical problems, ideas, and other major concerns from time to time. Monitor systems routinely to ensure that all business goals are met as per the user requirements.          Qualifications Experience:         BTech degree in Computer Science or related discipline, MTech degree preferred.        6+ years of overall experience in testing enterprise applications using SQA tools and practices.          6+ years in SQA Software testing experience using tools like Test Sigma, Appium, Postman.        4+ years experience in Mobile automation testing using tools like Appium. 3+ years experience in API automation and performing API automation using tools like Postman.      1+ years experience in using test automation tools like Test Sigma. Good to have Scam Master certified professional with an experience of running daily sprint and sprint deliverables.      Desirable to have experience in IoT domain and understanding on Embedded devices. Desirable to have experience in AWS services and using AWS services. Extensive project experience migrating from legacy systems and deploying complex cloud-based solutions.      Have strong verbal and written communications skills in English, as well as the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations and virtual teams.      Have executive speaking and presentation skills - including experience delivering formal presentations (to both large and small groups) and white-boarding sessions.          Education and Certifications         Bachelor s degree from a world-class school in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field preferred.      6+ years of experience working in a complex, matrixed organization.      6+ years of experience with front-end and user interface development. Certified in Agile (CSM, CSPO, SAFe)          Additional Skills         Detail oriented - you can see the big picture and break it down into small, digestible chunks      Passion for and understanding of technology - working knowledge of modern, cloud-based technology. Distributed computing expertise is a bonus.      Great communication - you can translate product requirements and designs into clear user stories, and communicate across product and technical teams to ensure requirements are understood and actionable.      Business acumen - a desire to understand how every new feature delights customers and impacts the business        Benefits:       We are committed to offering competitive benefits programs for all of our employees, and enhancing our programs when necessary.      Have peace of mind and body with our health insurance      Make yourself a priority with flexible schedules and leave Policy      Drive forward your career through professional development opportunities Achieve your personal goals with our Employee Assistance Program.
column11: Solution architecture, SQA, Front end, Coding, Enterprise applications, Configuration management, Agile, Troubleshooting, Information technology

column2: Software and/or Hardware engineering using SIEMENS engineering tools. Target focused delivering the engineering in time according to schedule. Always ensuring the highest quality of the engineering.             Deliver/execute projects and ensure to meet 100% quality (Scope, Schedule and Budget defined for a project) and high level of customer satisfaction.             Standardization in project and applications. Maximize reusability of standardized documents, applications, and engineering in projects.             Support Team Leader/Project Manager in managing team performance, develop self and team capability and motivate the team to deliver with high productivity.             Break down project activities, identify effort/skills required to complete the activities and sequence the activities. Communicates to manager regarding the resource requirement as per the schedule of project activities.             Proactive communication to team lead/ Project Manager and Customer during project execution.             Keep improving self-engineering capabilities and exchange best practice with other team members to improve team s capabilities.             Cost reduction through process improvement, through development of reusable engineering, engineering standardization and use of available productivity tools.             Work closely with the project management team to achieve customer acceptance. Demonstrate application technical expertise to get repeat orders and retain customer satisfaction.               o           Provide analysis and design recommendations in industry standards           o           Participate in opportunity pursuits, providing technical application support for customer discussions              Works with customers to determine the optimal control system solution and determines applicable hardware and software control configuration/architecture             Provide on-site control system commissioning as required              Driving various knowledge management initiatives by supporting development of success stories / Application notes / Demos.             Hardware or software engineering predominantly in the Global Engineering Center (GEC) but also at the locations of our partners, factory acceptance test support, commissioning on site. The projects include pharmaceuticals,      chemicals, food beverage, water/wastewater, and glass verticals.             Present the GEC as an attractive partner for outsourcing of work by communicating the provided sales material with focus on the business partner s benefit. Initiate, build and drive the revision of success stories and publish them in the social networks. Continuous networking with partners, creation of additional demand and forward to GEC core team.             Lead Engineer functions:            o           Act as the direct point of contact with customer for all technical aspects of the project           o           Lead and assign project related tasks of the engineering team for a project           o           Lead the development of technical specifications           o           Develop Work Breakdown structure for project and assign tasks, monitor performance, review results, coordinate efforts, and track hours of the project delivery team (local and remote)           o           Prepare technical aspects of project documentation and schedules in coordination with assigned project manager           o           Assist in preparing the technical aspects of supplier RFQ s and review corresponding quotations           o           Handle and respond to any technical queries on subject matter globally during any phase (from proposal to commissioning)           o           Review effort estimations and apply methods for optimization               Use your skills to move the world forward.             Experience Required:               BE/B.Tech in Instrumentation / Electronics / Electrical / ENTC and allied branches.            10    - 16 years of relevant experience in application and engineering of the Automation System in Pharma / FB technology / Chemical / WWW domain. Efficient in handling the execution of project activities, executes critical project activities and gets the work delivered from team members.             Advanced knowledge experience in DCS Automation System, Simatic PCS7 shall be preferable.             Advanced knowledge of Batch process (ISA S88 standard), Simatic Batch engineering, testing and commissioning expertise is preferable.             Should have good understanding of Pharma / FB technology / Chemical / WWW applications requirement such as Batch, Continuous and Discrete process. Should have sound knowledge of S88 standards, S95 Standards.             Good understanding knowledge of 21 CFR Part11 and GAMP5 guidelines.             Candidates with advance trainings certificate of Siemens DCS/PLC/SCADA/Instrumentation or such certificates from other automation vendor (manufacturer) company will be preferable.             DCS Systems: Simatic PCS7(Simatic PCS neo) engineering, testing, and commissioning expertise is preferable.             SCADA Systems: Simatic S7, TIA WinCC engineering, testing, and commissioning expertise is preferable.             Engineering tools knowledge: PCS7 Plant Automation Accelerator, COMOS is preferable.             Preferably, good experience on communication protocols like MODBUS, Profibus, Profinet, HART, Ethernet, OPC etc Should have gone through complete project life cycle from design phase to commissioning.             Candidate with Knowledge of Virtual Machines and networking will get additional consideration.             Good understanding of Server Client architecture, Thin client and RDP              Experience with at least one third party DCS, PLC, HMI, SCADA systems each              Good self-integration in international project teams. Easy adaption of European US and/or Middle east working styles. Social integration in the Host Countries. Self-challenging working style, taking ownership and solution oriented.             Must have good negotiation and intercultural skills.             Excellent English language skills. Knowledge of foreign languages eg, German, Spanish, French will have added advantage             Excellent customer focus.

column2: The Role The Technician position is a challenging role dealing with diverse set of problems, execute on build, test and release tasks of Drivers to create high quality products. Prepare Test Scenarios, writing positive, negative and boundary value level test cases based on the given Requirement, Design Document, Technical Specification Document, Prototype or wireframes.  - Involved in Functional Testing, Smoke Testing, Regression Testing.  - Participate in analyzing of Requirement Document, Design Document and Technical Specification document and getting clarification on the requirements if required.  - Perform peer code reviews to improve the quality of the test code base and optimize its execution.  - Write clear and reproducible software defect incident reports on VSTS. - Pro-actively seek to make continuous improvements to Test coverage, execution, and automation  - Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle.  - Comply with standards, procedures, guidelines, priorities, and schedules.  - Work with manager on requirement management, estimation, effort tracking, defect tracking and quality metrics.  - Maintains project tracking and provide status reports to the manager and customers in a timely manner.  - Generate and manage daily/monthly time logs and related reports.  - Well-developed interpersonal skills that can be leveraged in working with team members of different cultures and backgrounds. The ability to work across different teams within engineering and outside engineering to successfully achieve results.  - Effective testing by checking device logs, cloud logs, app logs etc.  EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS : - Bachelor's Degree in Computers or Information Technology or Electronics  TECHNICAL SKILLS : - 4+ years of Manual and Automation testing experience on Web Application, Mobile Apps, Appium, Voice testing, android studio/Eggplant.  - 2+ years of experience on testing IoT application - Software/Hardware  - 2+ years on experience on APIs, Database and Cloud testing.  - Proven experience as a QA tester or Individual Contributor role.  - Experience with keyword and data driven test automation  - Experience with development tools, such as JUnit, Eclipse, Visual Studio and TFS/Azure DevOps  - Experience with development quality practices, to include debugging and refactoring  - Experience with version control tools such as Git or SVN  - Experience implementing and testing APIs  - Experience with Agile Scrum methodologies  - Experience in writing SQL queries and database automation  - Experience with test automation for software products deployed in a cloud or hybrid environment utilizing cloud service platforms such as Azure  - Basic knowledge with Maven, CI/CD tools such as Jenkins  - Experience with test automation tools such as Selenium or Appium or similar tools, have experience in Android and iOS automation.  - Development experience with Java.  - Ability to create tests of code logic using Java testing frameworks  - Knowledge on Database queries, performance testing is added advantage.  BEHAVIORAL SKILLS : - Good Communication skills. Uses speaking and writing skills to effectively convey information, express opinions and motivate others to act.  - Flexible in work timing to support different geographic regions.  - Strong problem-solving skills.

column2: Job Title: Automation Test Engineer Location: Ahmedabad Department: Quality Assurance / Engineering Job Type: Full-time / Part-time / Contract   Job Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Automation Test Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and executing automated tests to ensure the quality and functionality of our software products. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand the software requirements, create test plans, and develop automated test scripts. Your work will play a crucial role in our continuous integration and deployment processes, helping us to deliver robust, scalable, and high-quality software solutions. Key Responsibilities: Test Automation Development:  Design, develop, and      maintain automated test scripts using tools and frameworks such as Playwright,Selenium,      Appium, JUnit, TestNG, or similar. Test Planning and Execution:  Collaborate with product      owners, developers, and other QA team members to define test requirements,      create detailed test plans, and execute automated test cases. Continuous Integration:  Integrate automated tests      into the CI/CD pipeline to ensure early and continuous testing of software      builds. Defect Tracking:  Identify, document, and      track software defects to closure using tools like Jira, Bugzilla, or      similar. Performance Testing:  Conduct performance and      load testing to assess system capabilities under varying workloads. Code Review:  Participate in code reviews      and ensure adherence to best practices in test automation. Test Framework Enhancement:  Continuously improve the      automation test framework to enhance test coverage and reliability. Reporting and Documentation:  Generate test reports,      document test results, and provide feedback to the development team. Tool Evaluation:  Evaluate and recommend new      tools and technologies to improve the testing process. Mentoring:  Provide guidance and      mentorship to junior team members on test automation best practices. Required Skills and Qualifications: Education:  BE/BTech ,MCA,MSCIT Experience: Mid-level:  1-6 years of experience in       software testing and test automation. Technical Skills: Proficiency in programming       languages such as Java, Python, C#, or JavaScript. Hands-on experience with       test automation tools like Playwright, Selenium, Appium, QTP, or similar. Knowledge of CI/CD tools       such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or Bamboo. Familiarity with version control       systems like Git or SVN. Experience with API testing       tools such as Postman, RestAssured, or SoapUI. Specific Experience:  Experience in testing ERP       software using automation testing tools is highly desirable. Soft Skills: Excellent problem-solving       skills and attention to detail. Strong verbal and written       communication skills. Ability to work       collaboratively in a fast-paced, agile environment. Self-motivated with a       passion for quality and technology. Additional Qualifications: Experience with cloud platforms       such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus. Knowledge of       containerization tools like Docker and orchestration platforms like       Kubernetes. Understanding of DevOps       practices and methodologies.
